lines:
% Lak, Tangshan

14 y April 27, 1914 
My dear Mr. Starus;

Arrwed Tang Shan 
several weeks ago. Am very Parry 
that I could not write you 
Looner as I was very sick 
since 2 got to Phanghai 
2 just got well but am 
Vanz weak at the present. Nach 
sicknen was due to a sudden 
Changed of Climate and also

cought a bad cold just 
two days before arravis 
Shanghai. I did not 
glang very cones at Shanghai 
as I felt so bad that 
time. Am glad I got 
well now . But the life 
in Tangshan + Thenter at 
the present time has no pical

n
raw: % Lak, Tangshan 14 y April 27, 1914 My dear Mr. Starus; Arrwed Tang Shan several weeks ago. Am very Parry that I could not write you Looner as I was very sick since 2 got to Phanghai 2 just got well but am Vanz weak at the present. Nach sicknen was due to a sudden Changed of Climate and also cought a bad cold just two days before arravis Shanghai. I did not glang very cones at Shanghai as I felt so bad that time. Am glad I got well now . But the life in Tangshan + Thenter at the present time has no pical n

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Handwritten letter stating that he has not written Stearns because of illness, shortening his stay in Shanghai. While there is no special news, he notes that China is building four railways. He encloses a draft for $300 and apologizes for the delay of the letter.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
